title: Add government resources section with official website links

requirements.summary: Create a Government Resources section component that displays a grid of quick access links to official government and regulatory websites
acceptanceCriteria: Government Resources section is displayed on the homepage
Each government website link includes an icon, website name, and description

Links include: Income Tax Department (https://www.incometax.gov.in/), ROC (https://www.mca.gov.in/content/mca/global/en/mca/master-data/MDS.html), MCA (https://www.mca.gov.in/), SEBI (https://www.sebi.gov.in/), GST Portal (https://www.gst.gov.in/), Professional Tax, MahaGST (https://mahagst.gov.in/), RERA (https://rera.maharashtra.gov.in/), NSE (https://www.nseindia.com/), and BSE (https://www.bseindia.com/)
All links open in a new browser tab
Section uses consistent styling with the existing emerald green and warm amber color scheme
Component is responsive and works on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create a new Government Resources component that displays a grid of government and regulatory website quick access links. Each link card should include an icon from the generated icon set (frontend/public/assets/generated/govt-icons-set.dim_512x512.png), website name, brief description, and official URL. Use the emerald green and warm amber color scheme from index.css. Implement responsive grid layout (3 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile). Include links for: Income Tax Department, ROC, MCA, SEBI, GST Portal, Professional Tax, MahaGST, RERA, NSE, and BSE. All links must use target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security. Include lucide-react icons for external link indicators. Follow the same card-based design pattern used in Services.tsx and WhyChooseUs.tsx with hover effects and smooth transitions.

requirements.summary: Integrate the Government Resources section into the main App.tsx layout between Notifications and Tax Calculators
acceptanceCriteria: Government Resources section appears in the correct position in the page flow
Navigation menu is updated to include smooth scrolling to the Government Resources section if needed
Section maintains proper spacing with adjacent sections

file_operations.description: Import the GovernmentResources component and add it to the layout after the Notifications section and before the TaxCalculators section. Wrap the component in a section element with an id='government-resources' for navigation purposes. Ensure proper spacing matches the existing section spacing pattern used throughout the application.

Add a 'Government Resources' navigation link to the navigation menu items array. Include the link between 'Notifications' and 'Tax Calculators' in the navigation order. Configure smooth scrolling behavior to the government-resources section id. Update the active section detection logic to highlight the Government Resources link when that section is in view. Ensure mobile menu includes the new navigation item.
